title.rendered: JOB POST: Full Stack Programmer at Turing [Remote, Full-time]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the role of Full Stack Programmer at Turing for the year 2025. Apply Now!

About Turing

Unleashing the world’s untapped human potential to accelerate AGI. Turing powers the next generation of AI by solving the human intelligence bottleneck and advancing AGI infrastructure. From frontier model research to real-world AI deployment, we help enterprises turn complex data into actionable intelligence.

Our work spans AGI post-training, reinforcement learning, multimodal AI, and enterprise-scale automation—driving measurable outcomes for Fortune 500 companies.

About the Job

A distinguished US-based client seeks a dedicated Full-stack Developer to join their dynamic team.

This opportunity suits professionals who excel in creating innovative solutions and aim to remain at the forefront of AI progress. Collaborate with various firms focused on developing cutting-edge AI solutions for commercial and research purposes.

Responsibilities

  • Employ Python and/or Javascript/Typescript knowledge to address issues while incorporating business acumen to enhance code functionality and organizational effectiveness.
  • Facilitate transparent communication with stakeholders to support organizational objectives.
  • Develop efficient response mechanisms through scripting or algorithms to automate user interactions.
  • Participate in troubleshooting efforts, documenting errors, and offering solutions for precise output validation.
  • Collaborate closely with researchers to understand requirements and deliver valuable insights.

 Requirements

  • Welcoming candidates from entry-level to industry veterans.
  • Must possess a Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a similar field.
  • Understanding of software engineering principles.
  • Well-versed with Python and JavaScript/TypeScript programming languages.
  • Effective in spoken and written English communication.

Benefits

  • Collaborate with leading experts worldwide and become part of a network tailored to your aspirations
  • Enjoy remote work flexibility with no traditional job constraints
  • Competitive salary based on global standards in USD
  • Contribute to pioneering projects that push technological boundaries, keeping you at the forefront of your field.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply through this link.wesClick here to view the official notification of the job post of Full Stack Programmer at Turing.
